remarks: The function values of a permutation for different arguments are different.  (Contributed by AV, 8-Jan-2019.)
statement:
symgbas.1 $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) $.
symgbas.2 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
symgfvne $p |- ( ( F e. B /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( ( F ` X ) = Z -> ( Y =/= X -> ( F ` Y ) =/= Z ) ) ) $.
